title: Who do you consider "League's Best Lizard?"... i know what it makes me sound like but I'm curious...
body:
I know that some people can get a little "antsy" about what what champion they like or don't like so I created a pool of champions that were selected to be the most popular Lizard champions in the game. I don't watch anime, manga, or anything like that because I poured bleach in my eyes in protest after Riot told us that they were not buffing our lord and savior Urgot in the near future. Everyone has their preference of Lizard's so vote away and don't be shy :)

http://cache.lovethispic.com/uploaded_images/thumbs/255829-Why-Does-This-Lizard-Look-Like-He-s-About-To-Make-Me-An-Offer-I-Can-t-Refuse.jpg

replies.body:
I make one thread... ONE THREAD... o-o


"Where is Shyvana tho, she is best lizard"
I've got the feeling that "imbecile" will get the majority of votes.
Well now you just rigged it.
I would be disappointed if it wasn't :)

{{champion:58}} Crocodile
{{champion:102}} Half Dragon
{{champion:69}} from the waist down
Old red buff
Every Dragon
Baron Nashor

Renekton is not a Crocodile, he is a ascended human that now _resembles_ a crocodile. 

Dragons are not lizards because Dragons are mythical creatures with no real class to be verified (TL:DR not a Lizard).

Cassiopeia is still human but has a serpents tail, it does not make her a actual lizard either. 

The rest are not champions.
These dragons on The Rift are technically Drakes, except the Elder Dragon.
I've got the same type of lizard as my pet actually XD
Same, I feel that a Leopard Gecko is for people that don't want to have a high maintenance animal, but still want to pay the same amount of money XD. R.I.P my electricity bill in the winter.
I voted for the only option that was a lizard: "lizard".
Wriggle is best lizard. There's a reason I refuse to use any Tristana skin other than Dragon Trainer.
Renekton.  Crocs are lizards.  Shyvana is part Dragon, Dragons are lizards (Not counting Sol because he is made of stars and shit)

http://theleagueoflegendsguide.weebly.com/uploads/2/6/8/5/26854117/_9281113.jpg

So awesome, he got to retire early. Renekton gets runner up though.
